name: Super Nintendo Game ROM
summary: An SNES file is a video game ROM file that contains a copy of a game originally released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES), a home video game console released by Nintendo in the early 1990s. It stores a duplicate of the same game data found on the original SNES cartridges, including graphics, audio data, and gameplay code. SNES files are supported by various emulators , which are software programs that allow users to play SNES games on modern computers and mobile devices.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
